statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports WHERE water_consumption > 100
SELECT department_name, water_consumption FROM water_usage_reports WHERE report_month = '2022-03-01'
SELECT report_id, department_name, water_consumption FROM water_usage_reports WHERE department_name = 'Engineering'
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports ORDER BY report_month DESC
SELECT AVG(water_consumption) AS average_consumption FROM water_usage_reports
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports WHERE department_name = 'Engineering' ORDER BY report_month DESC;
SELECT report_id, water_consumption FROM water_usage_reports WHERE water_consumption > 100 ORDER BY water_consumption ASC;
SELECT department_name, SUM(water_consumption) AS total_water_consumption FROM water_usage_reports GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports WHERE report_month BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY water_consumption DESC;
SELECT department_name, AVG(water_consumption) AS avg_water_consumption FROM water_usage_reports WHERE report_month < '2022-05-01' GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY avg_water_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, water_consumed FROM water_usage_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments WHERE department_head = 'John Smith';
SELECT report_id, department_id, water_consumed FROM water_usage_reports WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY water_consumed DESC;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT department_name, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM departments LEFT JOIN water_usage_reports ON departments.department_id = water_usage_reports.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT report_date, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM water_usage_reports GROUP BY report_date ORDER BY total_water_consumed DESC;

SELECT department_name, department_head, AVG(water_consumed) AS avg_water_consumed FROM departments JOIN water_usage_reports ON departments.department_id = water_usage_reports.department_id GROUP BY department_name, department_head ORDER BY avg_water_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT AVG(water_consumed) AS avg_water_consumed FROM water_usage GROUP BY month;
SELECT department_name, month, total_water_consumed FROM departments JOIN monthly_reports ON departments.department_id = monthly_reports.department_id;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT department_id, department_name, month, water_consumed FROM departments JOIN water_usage ON departments.department_id = water_usage.department_id;
SELECT department_id, department_name, AVG(water_consumed) AS avg_water_consumed FROM departments JOIN water_usage ON departments.department_id = water_usage.department_id GROUP BY department_id;

SELECT department_id, department_name, month, total_water_consumed FROM departments JOIN monthly_reports ON departments.department_id = monthly_reports.department_id ORDER BY total_water_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM department;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employee WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT meter_id, meter_reading, reading_date FROM water_meter ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM department WHERE department_name LIKE 'Eng%';
SELECT report_id, report_month, report_year FROM report WHERE report_year = 2022 AND report_month IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM department;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employee JOIN department ON employee.department_id = department.department_id;
SELECT meter_id, meter_reading, reading_date FROM water_meter WHERE meter_id > 100 ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_month, report_year, department_name FROM report JOIN department ON report.department_id = department.department_id;

SELECT employee_name, department_name, meter_reading FROM employee JOIN department ON employee.department_id = department.department_id JOIN water_meter ON employee.employee_id = water_meter.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM department;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employee WHERE department_id = 'xyz';
SELECT meter_location, department_id FROM water_meter WHERE department_id IN ('abc', 'def');
SELECT month, year, usage_in_gallons FROM water_usage ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC;
SELECT department_id, year, total_usage_in_gallons FROM monthly_report WHERE year = 2022 AND total_usage_in_gallons > 1000 ORDER BY total_usage_in_gallons DESC;
SELECT * FROM department;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employee LEFT JOIN department ON employee.department_id = department.department_id;
SELECT meter_location, department_name FROM water_meter LEFT JOIN department ON water_meter.department_id = department.department_id;
SELECT month, year, usage_in_gallons FROM water_usage WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT department_name, month, year, total_usage_in_gallons FROM monthly_report LEFT JOIN department ON monthly_report.department_id = department.department_id WHERE department_name = 'Engineering';
